title: Penne salad with bresaola and black olives
ingredients: ['340 g (12 oz) penne or other pasta shapes', '1 red pepper, halved lengthways and seeded', '100 g (3½ oz) sliced bresaola, cut into thin strips', '1 can stoned black olives in brine, about 185 g, drained, rinsed and sliced', '4 sun-dried tomatoes in oil, patted dry and sliced', '200 g (7 oz) yellow or red cherry tomatoes, cut in half', '40 g (1½ oz) rocket or young spinach leaves', '20 g (¾ oz) fresh basil leaves, shredded', 'Balsamic dressing', '3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 tbsp balsamic vinegar', 'salt and pepper']
